page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE ON A SUNDAY l985
page.content: I am Helen Clare McCrorie and I have a big sister called Marie. On a Sunday my dad, Marie and myself go to my Grandma's house. We have to wait a while until lunch is ready. During that time I occupy myself playing games, talking or sunbathing. When lunch is ready I come in. We normally have stew or curry. After lunch is finished I go and read the Sunday Post. When I have read the paper I like to tell my Grandma what has happened during the week. When we have said good-bye we drive home. In about five minutes we are home. I go out to play or watch television. At 7.l5 p.m. I watch Sorry a comedy series starring Ronnie Corbett. From then till bedtime I watch television or play with my games up in my bedroom.
